It is a very common question of students that how study books like ncert. To complete or cover up whole book you have to make strategy, routine and daily goals. Many of the students lack this important thing and they fail to cover up the vast syllabus. You should revise the previous day study everyday so that it can get struck to your brain and you can get references with it. Make your own notes on every topic and a hot notes on every chapter this will help to get all the important points if the chapter and it is easy to revise at the tine of exams or tests. All this work when you work hard from the day one without leaving a single day.
